body_html:
Advanced indexing also had a perf hit on CPU as well:

Using the same indexing test:

======= pytorch (0.4.1) =======
23.6 µs ± 46.8 ns per loop (mean ± std. dev. of 100 runs, 10000 loops each)

======= pytorch-nightly =======
54.6 µs ± 323 ns per loop (mean ± std. dev. of 100 runs, 10000 loops each)
body_text:
Advanced indexing also had a perf hit on CPU as well:
Using the same indexing test:
======= pytorch (0.4.1) =======
23.6 µs ± 46.8 ns per loop (mean ± std. dev. of 100 runs, 10000 loops each)

======= pytorch-nightly =======
54.6 µs ± 323 ns per loop (mean ± std. dev. of 100 runs, 10000 loops each)
body:
Advanced indexing also had a perf hit on CPU as well:

Using the same indexing test:

```bash
======= pytorch (0.4.1) =======
23.6 µs ± 46.8 ns per loop (mean ± std. dev. of 100 runs, 10000 loops each)

======= pytorch-nightly =======
54.6 µs ± 323 ns per loop (mean ± std. dev. of 100 runs, 10000 loops each)
```
